explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of Artificial Immune System (AIS), k-Nearest Neighbors (kNN), and artificial neural networks (ANN) to model and predict stock market movements, which are all machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper explicitly mentions implementing a supervised learning approach for modeling the stock market.
explanations.neural network: The paper compares the AIS model with an artificial neural network (ANN), indicating the relevance of neural networks in the study.
explanations.artificial neural network: The paper directly mentions the use of artificial neural networks (ANN) as one of the comparative models in the research.
